Quickstrike:





Quickstrike finally came to a lake. It wasn't too far away from the cave. He 
looked around, taking a careful watch of the ambient, making sure there were 
no Maximals around. Although he wouldn't mind that.

To him, the coast was clear. "Quickstrike, Terrorize." he commanded, and 
transformed to his robot mode. He coughed, thinking the dust had got into 
his respritory systems. He was a mess, dusty, and just had to get some fresh 
air.

To the Inferno with it; he dived in.
